=== Current Issues ===
The standard GSPCA driver with hardy, does not support the webcam and generates alot of error messages (behind the gui).

All tests are done with the gspca module blacklisted.

<code>echo "blacklist gspca" | sudo tee -a /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist</code>

One case, where the wlan interface would not work after resume from hibernation. Could not reproduce.

===== Optimal audio input settings (Hardy) =====
For Skype, eg.

(Based on danish audio device names)

'''Output:'''

"Mikrofon" ("Microphone") - Mic volume, set to 100%

"Mic Boost" - Mic boost, set to 100%

'''Input:'''

"Optage" ("Capture") - Seems to be input boost. Enabled, but at 0%

"Digital"  - Input microphone volume. Enabled, 100%
